mapper.update: update product set sell_time = current_time where product_id = #{productId}
update product set sell_time = null where product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (member_id, category, product_name, product_content, price, deal_direct, `direct_addressx`, `direct_addressy`, deal_delivery, product_views, temporary, `saved_time`) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{category}, #{productName}, #{productContent}, #{price}, #{dealDirect}, #{directAddressx}, #{directAddressy}, #{dealDelivery}, 0, #{temporary}, #{savedTime});
mapper.update: update product set category=#{category}, product_name=#{productName}, product_content=#{productContent}, price=#{price}, deal_direct=#{dealDirect}, `direct_addressx`=#{directAddressx}, `direct_addressy`=#{directAddressy}, deal_delivery=#{dealDelivery}, product_views=0, `saved_time`=#{savedTime},`temporary` = #{temporary} where member_id = #{memberId} and product_id=#{productId}
mapper.delete: delete from product where member_id = #{memberId} and product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: select * from product where member_id = #{memberId} and `temporary` = 0
select * from product order by product_views limit 5
